data.title: Co-Trainer
description: When I was a bachelor's student, I took a job as a freelance trainer for one week. My daily job was to train employees to use the Warehouse Management System Applications at PT. Pertamina Lubricants, based on DSP Balikpapan.
working with their company to handle inbound and outbound
